name: Martian Successor Nadesico ~Yappari Saigo ha [Ai ga Katsu] ?~
summary: "Martian Successor Nadesico ~Yappari Saigo ha [Ai ga Katsu] ?~" is the first game released for the Nadesico franchise. It is a dating sim with players taking the role of Akito Tenkawa and attempting to build relationships with the female crew members, although there are a few mecha elements included.
